15.6. Long Short-Term Memory Network Model 313
It may be interesting to explore tuning additional conÔ¨Ågurations such as the use of a
bidirectional input layer, stacked LSTM layers, and even hybrid models with CNN or ConvLSTM
input models. As with the CNN model, the LSTM model expects input data to have a three-
dimensional shape for the samples, time steps, and features.
# reshape input data into [samples, timesteps, features]
n_features = 1
